'Rings' is a 2005 American horror short film. It was initially released as an
extra disc with a re-release of [[The Ring (2002 film)|The Ring]] on DVD. The
events in Rings lead up to the sequel [[The Ring Two]], on whose DVD Rings is
also included as a bonus feature.
